# Unicode.GeneralCategory.modifierLetter

**Case**

A modifier letter.

## Declaration

```swift
case modifierLetter
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Modifier_Letter` (abbreviated `Lm`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.modifierLetter
